https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5QHiBwGchQlSYtwDxckHQYNcaLB.jpg A faithful adaptation of the micro-opera A Hand of Bridge (1958) by Samuel Barber. Two couples reveal their deepest desires, darkest fears, and wildest fantasies during an evening playing bridge. A Hand of Bridge
